full_summary:
# Procurement Notice - Electrical Supplies
## Contract Details
* **Contract Title (English)**: Electrical Supplies
* **Contract Title (French)**: Matériel Électrique
* **Reference Number (English)**: W2037-24-0097
* **Reference Number (French)**: W2037-24-0097
* **Solicitation Number (English)**: W2037-24-0097
* **Publication Date**: November 1st, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 15th, 2023, 11:00 am (local time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 16th, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 28th, 2024

## Procurement Overview
The Canadian government, through the Department of National Defence, invites qualified suppliers to bid on a contract for various electrical supplies.

## Solicitation Status
This procurement notice is for a competitive procurement process, open to all qualified Supply Arrangement Holders. No amendments have been made to the original procurement notice.

## Contracting Authority
Contact Information:
* **Contact Name (English)**: Tyler McEachern
* **Contact Name (French)**: Tyler McEachern
* **Phone Number (English)**: (506) 432-6656
* **Email (English)**: David.McEachern@forces.gc.ca

## Goods and Services
The Canadian government requires various electrical supplies, and the proposed contract period is expected to end on March 28th, 2024. A detailed description of the requirement is available in the attached tender notice document.

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
* **Region of Opportunity (English)**: Canada
* **Region of Opportunity (French)**: Canada
* **Region of Delivery (English)**: New Brunswick
* **Region of Delivery (French)**: Nouveau-Brunswick

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is open to Canadian suppliers, and in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Access to the Tender Document
The tender notice document, including the requirement description and other relevant information, is available for download from the Canadian Government Procurement website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23745/20230912_cfsme_240097t_npp_0.pdf.

## Deadline for Responses
All interested suppliers must submit their proposal by the tender closing date
